titles.title: HP734 Jesus my Truth, my Way

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, my Truth, my Way,
My sure, unerring Light,
On thee my feeble steps I stay,
Which thou wilt lead aright.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My Wisdom and my Guide,
My Counsellor, thou art;
O never let me leave thy side,
Or from thy paths depart!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Teach me the happy art
In all things to depend
On thee; O never, Lord, depart,
But love me to the end!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Through fire and water bring
Into the wealthy place;
And teach me the new song to sing,
When perfected in grace.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
O make me all like thee,
Before I hence remove!
Settle, confirm, and stablish me,
And build me up in love.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Let me thy witness live,
When sin is all destroyed;
And then my spotless soul receive,
And take me home to God.
